puzzles.title: Manor Entrance
puzzles.description: Find your way through the garden maze.

puzzles.title: Kitchen Path
puzzles.description: Find the way to the pantry.

puzzles.title: Wine Cellar
puzzles.description: Find your way through the dark cellar.

puzzles.title: Catacombs
puzzles.description: Find your way through the ancient catacombs.

puzzles.title: Labyrinth of Souls
puzzles.description: Lost spirits haunt this endless labyrinth.

puzzles.title: Depths Below
puzzles.description: Ancient passages stretch endlessly beneath the manor.

puzzles.title: The Final Passage
puzzles.description: The last barrier between you and freedom.

puzzles.title: Manor Objects
puzzles.description: Match items found in the manor.

puzzles.title: Haunted Gallery
puzzles.description: Match the portraits in the gallery.

data.prompt: I hoot at night and fly without sound. Who am I?
I dance but have no legs, I breathe but have no lungs, and I die when fed. What am I?
I have teeth but cannot bite. I open things but am not a hand. What am I?
I sleep by day and hunt by night. I hang upside down and use sound to see. What am I?
I can be seen but not touched. I can walk through walls. The living fear me. What am I?
I show you yourself but I am not you. I copy your moves but cannot think. What am I?
I have no doors but can be entered. No rooms but I have space. No keys yet I can be unlocked. What am I?
I have hands but cannot clap. I have a face but cannot smile. I tell you something but never speak. What am I?
I am not alive but I grow. I don't have lungs but I need air. I don't have a mouth but water kills me. What am I?

hints.hintText: Go right, then down, then right.
The left side has a path.
Go all the way down first.
Avoid dead ends on the right.
The bottom row is your highway.
The bottom row connects to the exit.
Go down, then right, then down again.
Wolf and cat are similar colors.
